CustomAction.Code: Log(System.Drawing.Color.DarkOliveGreen,"This is an Alliance only supported profile. AtticusG3 fucked the whole profile up and ran away.");

While.Condition: ((InbagCount (41805) + InbagCount (45932)) >= 60 || (InbagCount (41803) + InbagCount (34759)) >= 100 || (InbagCount (43268)*2 + InbagCount (36781) + InbagCount (36782)) >= 30 || (InbagCount (42942) + InbagCount (41802)) >= 60) && Cooking.Level >= 350 && Cooking.Level < 415
